app_descript:
Stream East

Brief: Stream East is an app designed for sports enthusiasts who desire a mobile solution for staying updated with the latest sports matches. With the Stream East app, you can keep track of scores, relive matches, and get detailed insights into a variety of sports events right from your device.

Craft your sports-viewing experience with ease and never miss a moment with Stream East. Whether you're on the go or at home, you'll have the sports world at your fingertips.
